tryGamesDescription: Try our demo mode to get comfortable with the games before playing with real bets.
readRulesDescription: Each game comes with comprehensive rules and strategy guides. Start with our beginner tutorials to master the basics.
joinTournamentsDescription: When you're confident, join tournaments to compete with other players and win amazing prizes.
responsibleGamingDescription: We are committed to providing a safe and responsible gaming environment. Use these tools to stay in control of your gaming experience.
timeLimitsDescription: Take regular breaks to stay in control and have fun.
selfExclusionDescription: If you feel you need a break, remember that it's important to play in moderation and seek balance.
depositLimitsDescription: Play responsibly: set your limits and stick to them.
supportDescription: If you feel you're losing control, seek help immediately.

diceBanner.title: Experience the Thrill!
diceBanner.subtitle: Amazing Games
diceBanner.description: Join our community of players in a safe and fun environment. Play responsibly and enjoy our selection of premium games.

pokerClassicDescription: Test your skills in Texas Hold'em against players from around the world.
